titles.title: United States Grain Standards Reauthorization Act of 2025
United States Grain Standards Reauthorization Act of 2025
United States Grain Standards Reauthorization Act of 2025
United States Grain Standards Reauthorization Act of 2025
United States Grain Standards Reauthorization Act of 2025
United States Grain Standards Reauthorization Act of 2025
To reauthorize the United States Grain Standards Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.
Reported by the Committee on Agriculture. H. Rept. 119-233.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 190.

action.text: Mr. Thompson (PA) moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 4550.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.
Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry. Reported by Senator Boozman with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 263.

committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To, Markup By

committee.name: House Agriculture
